com.adobe.platform.operation

Class Authentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.platform.operation.Authentication

  • public class Authentication
extends Object
    Utility to initialize authentication.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Authentication create(String identityJson)
      Creates an Authentication instance on the basis of auth credentials provided in JSON format.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Authentication create(String identityJson)
        Creates an Authentication instance on the basis of auth credentials provided in JSON format.
        Parameters:
        identityJson - a JSON string representation of authentication credentials. The string must be the value of the 'identity' key in the shared JSON config file.
        Returns:
        a new Authentication instance.
